ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́,
en: On that day the Lord with his relentless, large, strong sword will bring judgment on Leviathan,   the fleeing serpent #— #Leviathan, the twisting serpent. He will slay the monster that is in the sea.  # 27:1 Is 51:9

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́,
«Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ pyɛ́bɛ wɔɔn nkáʼa metÿǒ melùʼ,
en: I am the Lord, who watches over it

ngiemboon: N te gíŋe ńgẅiin gyáŋalóŋ ńtí yé wɔ́.
Táʼ, ńké ńgwɔ́ gie nyìŋ lɔɔn ńdyeen nzèm mèŋ,
en: Or let it take hold of my strength;

ngiemboon: Á ge gÿo gwaa gwɔ́ tsɔ́ ntyě fʉ̀ʼ,
en: In days to come, Jacob will take root.

ngiemboon: Tà Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ka cúɔ pʉ̀a pé,
Yɔɔn ee ntí gie mé ge gÿo tá lɔg vele mefʉa Yakwɔ̂b.
en: Therefore Jacob’s iniquity   will be atoned for in this way,

ngiemboon: Alagá nyìŋ té gÿo gíŋe gwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ metÿǒsoŋ
en: For the fortified city will be desolate,
When its branches dry out, they will be broken off.

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́,
Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́,
